cells.value: def map = JsonReader.jsonToMaps(System.getProperty('NCUBE_BOOTSTRAP')); def tenant = map.containsKey('tenant') ? map['tenant'] : input.tenant; def app = map.containsKey('app') ? map['app'] : input.app; def version = map.containsKey('version') ? map['version'] : '1.28.0'; def status = map.containsKey('status') ? map['status'] : 'SNAPSHOT'; def branch = map.containsKey('branch') ? map['branch'] : null; new ApplicationID(tenant, app, version, status, branch);
